tool_description: API allows to subscribe to any artist and be notified by provided webhook during the subscription time whenever the artist releases a new song.
name: New artist songs notifications
title: New artist songs notifications

api_list.name: Artist subscription
api_list.description: Whenever the artist releases a new song your webhook will be called. If there are any other desired integration or notification channels (via email, SMS, push notifications, etc.) drop a comment in a discussion.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-artist-songs-notifications.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/subscriptions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-artist-songs-notifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Test webhook
api_list.description: Calls provided webhook with the example of new song notification.
api_list.code:
